graph.topic: people will spend less time on cooking food

nodes.text: people are likely to spend less time in cooking food

with the development of science and technology, more advanced kitchen facilities, such as the modern microwaves or the advanced pressure cookers, have been created and invented to help people prepare and cook food in a very short time
people nowadays just spend one hour to prepare a meal instead of two, even three hours like in the last 10 years
in recent years, there was a significant increase in the number of people from all walks of life realizing this valueable benefit of those technologies in doing their housework
this figure still continueously go up along with the improvement of science and technology
it is certain that spending less time on cooking will be the main trend in near future
most of young people prefer to have meals at restaurants
they want to invest more time in their work or study to improve themselves

According to a recent survey, 89% of people have come to think that, since they have been put in the situation which is filled with competitions and pressures, they have to use a lot of time to work hard, to update themselves, to acquire all kinds of skills and so on
they find hard to have time to prepare and cook a meal
Even they have some spare time, they prefer to go out with friends to relax and relieve the pressure from work and study
investing much time in cooking food will guarantee nutrition as well as quality of food for their family
using technology or advanced facilities do not make food lose its nutrition and quality
Even, with the help of ozone machines, bacterias, mold spores, or pesticide in vegetables, fruits and foods will be killed and removed
health and life of eaters is assured
along with the high living standard, requirements of quality products in almost restaurants, nowadays, are under severe control and supervision by appropriate authorities
it is quite easy to have a nutritious meal with guaranteed quality, but do not waste a lot of time
it is obviously found that there are many solid reasons to support my viewpoint
people will spend less time in cooking food
